page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT FOR YOUNGSTERS
page.content: We asked a wide range of young people who lived in wellingborough what they did in the evenings in their spare time and what they thought about the town on the whole. Our results showed that the majority of the interviewees either played sport at the local sports centre or went out for a drink with their friend at a pub or club. The schoolchildren who were not old enough to do these things spent their time walking around the town or playing football in the park. To conclude our interviews, we asked what they thought of the town since the new facilities arrived. Nearly everyone thought that these were a good idea, but unfortunately a small minority spolit them for the rest of the community. K.Munns S_A Russell E.Barwell.
